In this work I was inspired by the book “Brutal Kunnin” by Mike Brooks

item.title: Mechanicus 40k fan art
item.description:
Hey everybody!
In this work I was inspired by the marvellous game Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus.
The intro still makes me shiver. Adeptus Mechanicus one of my favourite topics to paint.

Like my work? Feel free to contact me ✉ for your personalized piece of art anytime!
